title:Pandapaxxy's Heresy: Iron Banner, Nightfall, and Trials of Osiris Weapon Breakdown
description:Based on https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/1j4yxmn/heresy_iron_banner_nightfall_and_trials_of_osiris/

// Peacebond
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "I'm excited Peacebond came back, but PvE is not its place. Headstone and Rimestealer are great when on Stasis, but the alternative is Subsistence and Frenzy, on a sidearm feels kinda weak. Not that there's much better in Kill Clip. But I don't think it's Peacebondâ€™s fault." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Peacebond
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Where Peacebond does belong is over in the Crucible of Iron Osiris. Or something like that. Zen Moment really keeps that reticle bounce down and makes the third bullet less jumpy. Kill Clip allows you to immediately follow up as most sidearm magazines are pretty small, and the burst chews through ammo. If you're opting for a more neutral sidearm for Trials, competitive, or rumble then you should look for Lone Wolf or Rangefinder to really push out some stats or your range. Headseeker is great neutrally but you can't go wrong with Desperate Measures either." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=3437370193&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2387244414,1015611457

// Warlord's Spear
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "What a fun little trace rifle. I would recommend Rewind Rounds with Killing Tally to make the most of your ammo while supplementing your builds. Or you can go High-Impact Reserves with Target Lock to really deal damage into bosses. The newest perk, Detonator Beam, looks to be a trace rifle equivalent of Kinetic Tremors. Definitely a good perk to try out." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Warlord's Spear
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Trace rifles have seen less usage thanks to the special ammo changes a while back. The lower ammo count really hurts these weapons. Bungie keeps trying to adjust them but they're only fun when you can run around with them as a primary suped up auto rifle. Dynamic Sway Reduction will help the bloom and accuracy, though High-Impact Reserves will be nice every time you spawn dealing extra damage." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=1968711238&perks=3250034553,2969185026,1359896290,365154968
dimwishlist:item=1968711238&perks=3250034553,2969185026,1359896290,557221067

// Lotus-Eater
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "A rocket sidearm we can get adept. Heck yeah. The rest of them we could only *enhance*. Gross. One for All is easily the best damage perk because the rocket can damage more than one enemy at a time and get you up to max in one shot. Feeding Frenzy pairs with any of the damage perks, so pick your poison with that one. You can opt for some void synergy through Repulsor Brace and Withering Gaze or Destabilizing Rounds." Recommended MW: Velocity.|tags:pve,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=3922217119&perks=3525010810,1087426260,2779035018,4049631843
dimwishlist:item=3922217119&perks=3525010810,1087426260,2779035018,2048641572

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "A rocket sidearm we can get adept. Heck yeah. The rest of them we could only *enhance*. Gross. One for All is easily the best damage perk because the rocket can damage more than one enemy at a time and get you up to max in one shot. Feeding Frenzy pairs with any of the damage perks, so pick your poison with that one. You can opt for some void synergy through Repulsor Brace and Withering Gaze or Destabilizing Rounds." // The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "The palindrome. Madam, I'm Adam. This was a fan favorite. I'm glad it's back. It doesn't have a ton of utility in PvE. Explosive Rounds being in the first column is nice and boosts your passive damage a bit. Outlaw being the only reload perk is kinda sad (unless you use solar Elemental Capacitorâ€¦ew). Magnificent Howl will get you those big damage shots, while Master of Arms will be lower damage but much more frequent." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// The Palindrome
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "The stomping grounds for Palindrome was always the Crucible, why it got relegated to nightfalls is beyond me. Elemental Capacitor will boost your already high stats as nothing was gained or lost from the old version. Explosive Payload is fine for extra flinch but you lose a touch of range. Opening Shot is the easiest to recommend as it's always good. Snapshot Sights is also good neutrally. Magnificent Howl, Desperate Measures, or Master of Arms will all slightly adjust your damage. Magnificent Howl is the only guaranteed way to two-tap, but Desperate Measures and Master of Arms will both adjust your ease of use but none really shift the needle outside of needing one less crit. And it's also not guaranteed because depending on resilience you may need 2 stacks of either to kill all resiliences for 2c1b." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=2876244791&perks=1840239774,3142289711,3511092054,47981717
dimwishlist:item=2876244791&perks=1840239774,3142289711,3511092054,2720533289

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "The stomping grounds for Palindrome was always the Crucible, why it got relegated to nightfalls is beyond me. Elemental Capacitor will boost your already high stats as nothing was gained or lost from the old version. Explosive Payload is fine for extra flinch but you lose a touch of range. Opening Shot is the easiest to recommend as it's always good. Snapshot Sights is also good neutrally. Magnificent Howl, Desperate Measures, or Master of Arms will all slightly adjust your damage. Magnificent Howl is the only guaranteed way to two-tap, but Desperate Measures and Master of Arms will both adjust your ease of use but none really shift the needle outside of needing one less crit. And it's also not guaranteed because depending on resilience you may need 2 stacks of either to kill all resiliences for 2c1b." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller

// Exalted Truth (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "The Trials version of Palindrome. They feel slightly different between the two. Withering Gaze and Demoralize, Repulsor Brace and Destabilizing Rounds. Take your pick. All will work well together." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Exalted Truth
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Exalted Truth is a better Palindrome depending on what you're looking for. Slideshot and Zen Moment are both incredible. Lone Wolf or Keep Away are also great in slot. There's only bad options if you want a strictly PvP roll instead of both PvP and PvE. Eye of the Storm will allow for some much needed forgiveness as the gunfight goes on. Opening Shot will all but guarantee your first shot is a crit. And Magnificent Howl will allow for two taps." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller

// Keen Thistle
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Keen Thistle does have some great options for becoming your next sniper. Snapshot and Opening Shot or Moving Target are both good tried and true options. Closing Time is the best option for if you don't get ammo often as it requires you to be at 1 ammo, or 2 with a magazine boosting perk. Slickdraw is my favorite sniper perk because it forces you to be a little more accurate but gives you all the benefits of old Quickdraw. I understand the community is divided on Slickdraw." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller

// Keen Thistle (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Keen Thistle does have some great options for becoming your next sniper. Snapshot and Opening Shot or Moving Target are both good tried and true options. Closing Time is the best option for if you don't get ammo often as it requires you to be at 1 ammo, or 2 with a magazine boosting perk. Slickdraw is my favorite sniper perk because it forces you to be a little more accurate but gives you all the benefits of old Quickdraw. I understand the community is divided on Slickdraw." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
